item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello! This is Manju, I’m currently an expert technologist @ Hewlett-Packard Enterprise (HPE) working on Deep Learning/Artificial Intelligence. Earlier, I worked on High-Performance Computing (HPC) and also scalable real-time visualization. My current interests are centered around pipeline optimization of large workloads, bayesian models such as Gaussian Processes (GP) and uncertainty quantification. I particularly like gpytorch for making GP models. To get in touch with me send me an e-mail at my gmail.
